summary: "Star Trek" (2009) is an action-packed science fiction movie directed by J.J. Abrams. It's the 11th film in the Star Trek series and a reboot with a new cast. The story follows James T. Kirk (Chris Pine) and Spock (Zachary Quinto) aboard the USS Enterprise as they battle Nero (Eric Bana), a dangerous Romulan from their future. The film takes place in an alternate reality, allowing for new storylines while keeping some original elements. It was a big hit, making over $385 million worldwide and winning an Academy Award for Best Makeup.
title: Star Trek (2009 film)
